actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the amount of the stock which certain private foundations may hold certain public utilities without being subject to the excise tax on excess business holdings.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase from 50 to 51 percent the amount of stock which certain private foundations may hold in certain public utilities without being subject to the excise tax on excess business holdings.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the amount of the stock which certain private foundations may hold certain public utilities without being subject to the excise tax on excess business holdings.
